title: In-Game Connection Issues
body: Usually while I am in a game I average about 64 ms, but recently the game has been deemed unplayable due to me getting about 70-100 ms while out of fight and like 5000 when the fights beginning  (even 1v1) . I have 4 other people in my household who also play League and their connection is fine, at first I thought it could have been my gpu not wanting to process, but I found that i'm getting about 150-200 frames, so please if you have any suggestions on how to solve this, i'm all ears. Thanks!!

replies.body: That sucks, and it sounds like these issues could be caused by packet loss.  Regardless of how fine your connection is, you can still have problems reaching specific services, like the game server.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) so we can get a better overview of your specific case.  Let me know what you find.
